body: 1. Open **Cloud Shell** by selecting the icon **>_** in the top menu.
1. In the **Storage account subscription** dropdown, select the existing subscription.
1. Select **Select existing storage account** and click **Next**.
1. In the **Resource Group** dropdown, select the existing resource group.
1. In the **Storage account name** drop-down, select the existing Storage account.
1. In the **File share** drop-down, select the existing File share.
